pageTitle: Pearl Izumi Symphony Thermal Hooded Jersey - Long-Sleeve - Women's | Competitive Cyclist
title: Pearl Izumi Women's Apparel
textBeforeTable: Women's Apparel Pearl Izumi Size chart cool weather cycling Recommended Use: quarter-length Zip: single zippered back with three inside dividers Pockets: slim Fit: 95% polyester, 5% spandex Material: Tech Specs The Pearl Izumi Women’s Symphony Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey comes with reflective elements for better visibility in low level lighting. It is available in six rich color choices: Peacock, Black, Pink Punch, Orchid, Black Spyro, Blue Jewel, as well as two high-vis options in Green Flash and Safety Orange. It comes in sizes X-Small through X-Large. You'll also notice the Symphony has a quarter-length zipper. This zipper is backed by not only with a draft flap, but also with a zipper garage which encases the length of the zipper, ensuring fantastic protection from those cold winds you’ll undoubtedly encounter. The 3-in-1 rear pockets have been designed through a bit of clever tailoring to maximize
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg. Sleeve: Measure from the center of your back to your wrist with arms held out.
